snippet: Ricky Gervais and Zaha Hadid curl up in a bird’s nest while considering a floor-scrubbing robot and a lamp made from a weed.
lead_paragraph: Ricky Gervais and Zaha Hadid curl up in a bird’s nest while considering a floor-scrubbing robot and a lamp made from a weed.

headline.main: A Dual Review of What’s New Starring Zaha Hadid and Ricky Gervais
